mapper.sql: logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, record_num, currency, fee_sum, correct_fee, error_num, diff_sum, cur_state, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_pay_result WHERE 1=1 AND (logid = #{logid} OR logid LIKE '%'||#{logid}||'%') '%'+#{logid}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{logid}, '%')) ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_pay_result( logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, record_num, currency, fee_sum, correct_fee, error_num, diff_sum, cur_state, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{trade_day}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{record_num}, #{currency}, #{fee_sum}, #{correct_fee}, #{error_num}, #{diff_sum}, #{cur_state}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_pay_result SET logid = #{logid}, trade_day = #{trade_day}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, record_num = #{record_num}, currency = #{currency}, fee_sum = #{fee_sum}, correct_fee = #{correct_fee}, error_num = #{error_num}, diff_sum = #{diff_sum}, cur_state = #{cur_state}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
